participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, always looking for ways to connect with others.
participant_1.background: I love my friends, and I'm so glad I have them. I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in. I drive a Prius. I enjoy spending time with my family and pets, and I also like to read, play games, and watch movies. I am bored of my maids.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, finds joy in nature and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I love the feeling of freedom when I'm on my skateboard or skis. I should have been a farmer, growing my own beef. I've lived in many places, but I grew up in a small town in the Midwest. My number is 42. I work 60 hours a week so I can't go to the game, but I'll be cheering from home!

content.text: How do you like the new year so far?
I love the feeling of freedom that comes with the new year! I've been meaning to get back into skateboarding and skiing, but I've been so busy with work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a farmer, but I've been working 60 hour weeks this month so I haven't had much time for anything else.
Dang! That's a lot of hours. I work as a maid, and it can be pretty time consuming too, but not as much as 60 hours a week!
Yeah, I'm pretty tired, but it's worth it. I love being a farmer. It's hard work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can understand that. I love my job too. I like the feeling of satisfaction that comes with helping people.
Yeah, that's a great feeling. I'm glad you love your job.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to skateboard and ski. I also like to go hiking and camping. I love being outdoors.
I love to go hiking and camping too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Yeah, it is. I love being away from all the noise and pollution of the city.
Me too. I love being able to hear the birds singing and the wind blowing through the trees.
